pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Entropy Calibration // Generalized Entropy Calibration produces calibration weights using generalized entropy as the objective function for optimization. This approach, as implemented in the 'GECal' package, is based on Kwon, Kim, and Qiu (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2404.01076. Unlike traditional methods, 'GECal' incorporates design weights into the constraints to maintain design consistency, rather than including them in the objective function itself.
